content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining Station at (-14.0, -15.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, -15.0)
- Wooden chest at (-23.5, -16.5) containing 112 coal

###Iron Mining Station at (-14.0, 23.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) containing 583 iron ore

###Iron Smelting Station at (-10.0, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (-11.0, 20.0) and (-9.0, 20.0), both fueled with 23 coal each

###Copper Processing Line at (20.0, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0)
- Input wooden chest at (20.5, 21.5)
- Middle wooden chest at (22.5, 21.5) containing 380 copper ore
- Burner inserter at (21.5, 21.5) moving items from input chest to middle chest
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0) fueled with 50 coal
- Output wooden chest at (24.5, 17.5) containing 53 copper plates
- Burner inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving items from furnace to output chest

ERROR TIPS

###Errors when placing inserters
- Before placing a new inserter, verify that there isn't already an inserter at the target position
- When using place_entity_next_to(), consider adjusting the spacing parameter if the default spacing results in conflicts
- Check the direction parameter when placing inserters to ensure proper orientation for item movement

###Entity Status Issues
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel - implement regular fuel checking and refilling
- Furnaces showing NO_INGREDIENTS status - ensure proper input material flow through the production line
- Inserters showing WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS - verify the supply chain is properly connected and supplied
